Package ohos.bluetooth

Class BluetoothHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.bluetooth.BluetoothHost

  • public final class BluetoothHost
extends Object
    Manages Bluetooth on a device, such as enabling and disabling Bluetooth.

    The BluetoothHost#getDefaultHost method can be used to obtain a BluetoothHost instance, which can be used to perform Bluetooth operations on a device.

    You can use enableBt() to enable Bluetooth, disableBt() to disable Bluetooth, startBtDiscovery() to start a device scan, and cancelBtDiscovery() to cancel a device scan.

    Since:
    1

        Output: none

      • EVENT_HOST_NAME_UPDATE

        public static final String EVENT_HOST_NAME_UPDATE
        Indicates the event reported when the Bluetooth name changes.

        EVENT_HOST_NAME_UPDATE contains detailed information about the Bluetooth name change.

        Output: HOST_PARAM_HOST_NAME indicates the Bluetooth name.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        HOST_PARAM_HOST_NAME, Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_HOST_SCAN_MODE_UPDATE

        public static final String EVENT_HOST_SCAN_MODE_UPDATE
        Indicates the event reported when the Bluetooth scan mode changes.

        EVENT_HOST_SCAN_MODE_UPDATE contains detailed information about the change in the Bluetooth scan mode.

        Output: HOST_PARAM_SCAN_METHOD indicates the Bluetooth scan mode.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        EVENT_HOST_SCAN_MODE_UPDATE, HOST_PARAM_SCAN_METHOD, Constant Field Values

      • EVENT_HOST_STATE_UPDATE

        public static final String EVENT_HOST_STATE_UPDATE
        Indicates the event reported when the Bluetooth state changes.

        EVENT_HOST_STATE_UPDATE contains detailed information about the Bluetooth state change.

        Output: HOST_PARAM_PRE_STATE indicates the Bluetooth state before the change; HOST_PARAM_CUR_STATE indicates the Bluetooth state after the change.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        EVENT_HOST_STATE_UPDATE, HOST_PARAM_PRE_STATE, HOST_PARAM_CUR_STATE, Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultHost

        public static BluetoothHost getDefaultHost​(Context context)
        Obtains a default BluetoothHost instance to perform Bluetooth operations on a device.
        Parameters:
        context - Ability context that contains package name.
        Returns:
        Returns the default BluetoothHost instance.

      • enableBt

        public boolean enableBt​()
        Enables Bluetooth on a device.

        This method is used to start Bluetooth hardware and all Bluetooth services, such as A2DP and HFP.

        This is an asynchronous method. The result is returned immediately after your application calls the method. Your application must listen to EVENT_HOST_STATE_UPDATE broadcast for the change of the Bluetooth status.

        Returns:
        Returns true if Bluetooth is being enabled; returns false if an error occurs.

      • disableBt

        public boolean disableBt​()
        Disables Bluetooth on a device.

        This method is used to disable Bluetooth hardware and all Bluetooth services, such as A2DP and HFP.

        This is an asynchronous method. The result is returned immediately after your application calls the method. Your application must listen to EVENT_HOST_STATE_UPDATE broadcast for the change of the Bluetooth status.

        Returns:
        Returns true if Bluetooth is being disabled; returns false if an error occurs.

      • getBtState

        public int getBtState​()
        Obtains the Bluetooth status of a device.
        Returns:
        Returns the Bluetooth status, which can be STATE_OFF, STATE_TURNING_ON, STATE_ON, STATE_TURNING_OFF, STATE_BLE_TURNING_ON, STATE_BLE_ON, or STATE_BLE_TURNING_OFF.

      • getRemoteDev

        public BluetoothRemoteDevice getRemoteDev​(String addr)
        Obtains the BluetoothRemoteDevice object with a specified Bluetooth address.

        The letters in the Bluetooth address must be in uppercase.

        Parameters:
        addr - Indicates a valid Bluetooth address.
        Returns:
        Returns the BluetoothRemoteDevice instance with the specified address.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the Bluetooth address is invalid.

      • getLocalName

        public Optional<String> getLocalName​()
        Obtains the Bluetooth friendly name of a device.

        The name is visible to other Bluetooth devices.

        Returns:
        Returns the Bluetooth friendly name; returns Optional#empty() if an exception occurs.

      • setLocalName

        public boolean setLocalName​(String name)
        Sets the Bluetooth friendly name of a device.

        This is an asynchronous method. Your application must listen to the EVENT_HOST_NAME_UPDATE broadcast for the setting result.

        Parameters:
        name - Indicates a valid Bluetooth name.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Bluetooth name is set successfully; returns false otherwise.

      • startBtDiscovery

        public boolean startBtDiscovery​()
        Starts scanning Bluetooth devices.

        This is an asynchronous method.

        An inquiry scan takes about 12.8s. Your application must listen to EVENT_HOST_DISCOVERY_STARTED and EVENT_HOST_DISCOVERY_STARTED broadcasts for the start and stop of the scan, and listen to the BluetoothRemoteDevice#EVENT_DEVICE_DISCOVERED broadcast for whether Bluetooth devices are detected in the scan.

        Returns:
        Returns true if the scan is started successfully; returns false otherwise.

      • cancelBtDiscovery

        public boolean cancelBtDiscovery​()
        Stops Bluetooth device scanning.
        Returns:
        Returns true if scanning is stopped successfully; returns false otherwise.

      • isBtDiscovering

        public boolean isBtDiscovering​()
        Checks whether Bluetooth scanning is ongoing on a device.
        Returns:
        Returns true if Bluetooth scanning is ongoing; returns false otherwise.

      • getBtScanMode

        public int getBtScanMode​()
        Obtains the Bluetooth scanning mode of a device.
        Returns:
        Returns the Bluetooth scanning mode, SCAN_MODE_NONE, SCAN_MODE_CONNECTABLE, or SCAN_MODE_CONNECTABLE_DISCOVERABLE.

      • getProfileConnState

        public int getProfileConnState​(int profile)
        Obtains the status of the connection between current device's Bluetooth profile and other Bluetooth devices.

        Currently, this method applies only to the ProfileBase#HFP and ProfileBase#A2DP profiles.

        Parameters:
        profile - Indicates the profile, either ProfileBase#HFP or ProfileBase#A2DP.
        Returns:
        Returns the connection status, which can be ProfileBase#STATE_DISCONNECTED, ProfileBase#STATE_CONNECTING, ProfileBase#STATE_CONNECTED, or ProfileBase#STATE_DISCONNECTING.

      • getPairedDevices

        public List<BluetoothRemoteDevice> getPairedDevices​()
        Obtains the list of Bluetooth devices that have been paired with the current device.

        The return value of this method is valid only if the Bluetooth status of the current device is STATE_ON.

        Returns:
        Returns a list of paired Bluetooth devices through BluetoothRemoteDevice.

      • getBleCapabilities

        public int getBleCapabilities​()
        Obtains the Bluetooth BLE capability of a device.
        Returns:
        Returns the BLE capability in bit mask format, which can be BLE_CAP_2M_PHY, BLE_CAP_CODED_PHY, BLE_CAP_EXTENDED_ADV, BLE_CAP_PERIODIC_ADV, BLE_CAP_MULTIPLE_ADV, BLE_CAP_OFFLOADED_FILTER, or BLE_CAP_OFFLOADED_SCAN_BATCH.

      • getBleMaxAdvertisingDataLength

        public int getBleMaxAdvertisingDataLength​()
        Obtains the maximum length of advertising data supported by the Bluetooth BLE of a device.
        Returns:
        Returns the maximum length of advertising data.

      • setBtScanMode

        public boolean setBtScanMode​(int mode,
                             int duration)
        Sets the Bluetooth scan mode for a device.
        Parameters:
        mode - Indicates the Bluetooth scan mode to set. It can be: SCAN_MODE_NONE, SCAN_MODE_CONNECTABLE, or SCAN_MODE_CONNECTABLE_DISCOVERABLE.
        duration - Indicates the duration in seconds, in which the host is discoverable.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Bluetooth scan mode is set; returns false otherwise.

      • setDevicePairingConfirmation

        public boolean setDevicePairingConfirmation​(BluetoothRemoteDevice device,
                                            boolean accept)
        Sets the confirmation of pairing with a certain device.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the pairing confirmation is set; returns false otherwise..

      • isValidBluetoothAddr

        public static boolean isValidBluetoothAddr​(String addr)
        Checks whether the Bluetooth address is valid.

        Letters in the Bluetooth address string must be uppercase, for example, AA:BB:03:04:05.

        Parameters:
        addr - Indicates the Bluetooth address in string.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Bluetooth address is valid; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3
